Class Description
Camera
The type Camera represent the rays/vectors the "camera" send to the view plane.
CameraIntegrationTest
The Camera integration test check the num of intersection between rays and geometries by going through the viewPlane.
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
